
**Codes for general settings.**^[See `childRmd/_header.Rmd` file for other general settings]


**setup global chunk settings**

Change `echo = FALSE` to hide codes after knitting.

```{r global_options}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    eval = TRUE,
    echo = TRUE,
    fig.path = here::here("figs/"),
    message = FALSE,
    warning = FALSE,
    error = FALSE,
    cache = FALSE,
    comment = NA,
    tidy = TRUE,
    fig.width = 12,
    fig.height = 8
)
```
